name: Ulfric
bio: A big wolfy guy with a big wolfy punch.

name: Isaac
bio: A wizarding boy, great with animals and smiles.

name: Rogue AI
bio: A menacing, hyper-intelligent AI possessing a robotic shell.

name: Lou
bio: A superpowered mechanic and miscreant, equipped with massive metal arms.

name: Patches
bio: A massive mountain troll, well-meaning but incredibly dull.

name: Eelis
bio: An unusual girl, constantly scheming with her magic over the mind.

name: Frankie
bio: A friendly witch, possessing excellent hand-to-hand training and weaponized clothing.
